title: World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument: Audio Archive
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Audio Archive              Audio Archive              Clarendon Hetrick     Pearl Harbor Survivor Clarendon Hetrick talks about his experience on the USS Arizona on December 7, 1941. Mr. Hetrick passed away on April 18, 2016, at the age of 92.  Duration:3 minutes, 37 seconds      Credit / Author: NPS   Date created: 1985-12-06
